meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Special recognition of former Park Board Member Priscilla Rice for her service to the Park & Recreation Board

agenda_items.title: Kidd Springs Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Alison Matis, to serve alcohol at the Blues, Bandits & BBQ event to be held at Kidd Springs Park, located at 711 West Canty Street, on Saturday, November 16, 2024, from 11:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

agenda_items.title: Bachman Lake
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Taryn Federer, to serve alcohol at the Super Sam's 5k & Dino Dash event to be held at Bachman Lake, located at 3500 W. Northwest Highway, on Saturday, November 2, 2024, from 7 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.

agenda_items.title: Interlocal Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a 20-year interlocal agreement between the City of Dallas and the Richardson Independent School District (RISD) for shared access of campus grounds and the design, construction and maintenance of park improvements at Dobie Pre-Kindergarten School located at 14040 Rolling Hills Ln.

agenda_items.title: Preston Green Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize adoption of the Preston Green Park Master Plan.

agenda_items.title: Bachman Creek Greenbelt
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on December 11, 2024, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of parkland at Bachman Creek Greenbelt by Dallas Water Utilities for the construction of a 36-inch stormwater line for the Rexford Road Project.

agenda_items.title: Encroachment Policy
agenda_items.description: Authorize approval of the revisions to the Park and Recreation Department Encroachment Policy, Section VI: Park Department Encroachment Actions.

agenda_items.title: Executive Session
agenda_items.description: Seeking advice of the City Attorney regarding the Cityâ€™s management contract with Fair Park First and other related matters.

agenda_items.title: Budget Development Update
agenda_items.description: Update on budget development by Rachael Berry, Assistant Director.

financial_items.description: Estimated Revenue from Kidd Springs Park event
Estimated Revenue from Bachman Lake event
Revenue from Bachman Creek Greenbelt public hearing
